meaningMnemonic: Let's <kanji>divide</kanji> the <kanji>duty</kanji> up amongst various people. Each person will have their own <vocabulary>role</vocabulary> in completing this duty.
readingMnemonic: The readings are the ones you learned with the kanji. See how we divide up the duty of learning kanji into radicals and kanji and vocab? Makes it nice, right? Each piece is its own 役割.
